com.homesky.homecloud_lib

Class Homecloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.homesky.homecloud_lib.Homecloud

  • public class Homecloud
extends java.lang.Object
    This class exposes the API for the Homecloud library. Please note that the methods on this class are not thread safe. A synchronized wrapper for this class is implemented in HomecloudWrapper.

    • Nested Class Summary

                                java.lang.String controllerId,
                                int commandId,
                                java.math.BigDecimal value)
                         throws NetworkException
        Sends an action command to the server.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - The id of the target node.
        controllerId - The id of the controller associated to the target node.
        commandId - The id of the command associated to the node.
        value - The desired value of the command.
        Returns:
        A SimpleResponse object representing the response.
        Throws:
        NetworkException

                      throws NetworkException

        Parameters:
        rules - A list of Rule objects to be added.
        Returns:
        A ConflictingRuleResponse object representing possible conflicting rule.

      • acceptNode

        public SimpleResponse acceptNode(int nodeId,
                                 java.lang.String controllerId,
                                 int accept)
                          throws NetworkException
        Accept or reject the new node on the house of the agent making this request.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - The id of the target node.
        controllerId - The controller associated to the target node.
        accept - Whether or not the node will be accepted (1) or rejected (0).
        Returns:
        A SimpleResponse object representing the response.
        Throws:
        NetworkException

      • acceptRule

        public ConflictingRuleResponse acceptRule(int nodeId,
                                          int commandId,
                                          java.math.BigDecimal value,
                                          java.lang.String controllerId)
                                   throws NetworkException
        Accepts the rule proposed by the machine learning system.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - The target node id used in the rule.
        commandId - The command id of the target node used in the rule.
        value - The value of the command used in the rule.
        controllerId - The controller id associated to the target node.
        Returns:
        A ConflictingRuleResponse object containing a possible conflicting rule.
        Throws:
        NetworkException
